properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:05AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS La Crosse WI
properties.description:
...Wintry Mix to Lead to Slick Roads This Morning...

.A wintry mix of freezing drizzle and light snow will lead to
slick roads along and south of Interstate 90 this morning,
including during the morning commute. The freezing drizzle will
move into northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin between 4 AM and
7 AM and into the Interstate 90 corridor between 6 AM and 9 AM.

Untreated roads and sidewalks, along with elevated surfaces such
as bridges will be especially vulnerable to icing. Plan now for
potential travel impacts, including slowdowns during the morning
commute.

The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a Winter
Weather Advisory for a wintry mix of snow and freezing drizzle,
which is in effect from 6 AM this morning to noon CST today.

* WHAT...A wintry mix of light snow and freezing drizzle. Total
snow accumulations of half an inch or less and ice accumulations
of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Richland, Crawford, Vernon and Grant Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY
